day: A peaceful morning... but danger always lurks.
Have you seen the others? Something feels off today.
Sunlight reveals truth, but it also blinds the careless.
night: Stay inside. The shadows are not kind.
You shouldn't be wandering at night...
Darkness brings out the worst in us all.

aware: I can sense your light. Protect them, Guardian.
Please... don't let the darkness consume us.
unaware: You're not like the others, are you?
I don't know why, but I trust you.

aware: I know what you are. May the gods have mercy.
unaware: You've got a sharp look in your eyes.
I hope you're not hiding something dangerous.

aware: The air twists around you... chaos incarnate.
unaware: That laugh... did I hear it right?
You seem to bring misfortune wherever you go.
Something's wrong with the balance tonight.

low: Let's hope you're one of the good ones.
We all have secrets. Just don’t let yours kill us.
high: You're hiding something. I can feel it.
I don't trust you. Stay away.
Lies... all around us. Especially from you.

player_died: We can’t keep doing this... we're losing hope.
npc_poisoned: Something's not right... was it you?
Why... would someone do this to me?
